wikipedia_page.main: Graham Clapham (born 23 September 1947) is an English former professional footballer who played as a midfielder.

response: Clapham's father, Graham Clapham, and grandfather, Bert Wilkinson, were also professional footballers.

He made an explosive start to his Chester career by scoring four times on his full home debut against Gillingham but was to struggle for goals after this.Player Memories – Bernard Purdie, Chester City v York City matchday programme 7/1/95, p 15 At the end of 1972–73 he was released by Chester along with Graham Clapham and Mick Hollis.
Wilkinson was married to Teresa and had two children. His son-in-law Graham Clapham and grandson Jamie Clapham also played football professionally.
